newsitem.title: USA: Peregrine IPO price range cut to $10-$11.
newsitem.headline: Peregrine IPO price range cut to $10-$11.

text.p: UBS Securities Inc said on Tuesday that the price range for Peregrine Systems Inc's initial public offering was reduced to $10 to $11 per share of common stock from $10 to $12.
The number of shares in the offering has also been lowered to 2.4 million from 3.0 million.
UBS Securities will serve as lead underwriter in the offering, which is expected to price on Wednesday under the proposed symbol "PRGN" for trading on the Nasdaq National Market.
Peregrine, a San Diego-based company, markets and supports an integrated suite of applications that automates the management of complex information technology infrastructures.
